title: PBE sign up error 500

embed.description: The Public Beta Environment (PBE) is a limited-access public League of Legends realm where players help us test "declassified" features, content and experiments that aren't yet (and may never be) ready for prime time.

body: Was wondering what could be done to fix this, I got an email to join the pbe a week ago and still keep getting this link.

replies.body: The 500 error ob the PBE page is an issue we're looking into, but some players have been able to workaround this by using a VPN.  I don't have any further details or updates on a more permanent resolution just now.  Hopefully that gets you in!
